entry.string: MySQL_Configuration
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/select
SELECT name FROM topic

SELECT n.title, n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND n.processed=0 AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title

SELECT n.title, n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, p.url photos FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title
Select id from topic where topic.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic]
SELECT email FROM client WHERE validated=1 AND region=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND subscription=1
SELECT email FROM client WHERE validated=1 AND region=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND subscription=0

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name='World Sport' AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title
Select id from topic where name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic]
SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) FROM news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id GROUP BY n.title

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights FROM news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id GROUP BY n.title
SELECT n.title, n.content FROM news n, topic t WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic]

SELECT n.title, n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, GROUP_CONCAT(p.url) images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.news_id=n.id GROUP BY n.title

SELECT (n.title), n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, p.url FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name=#[message.outboundProperties.topic] AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title

SELECT n.title, n.content,GROUP_CONCAT(h.content) highlights, (p.url)images FROM photo p, news n, topic t, highlight h WHERE n.topic_id = t.id AND t.name='World Sport' AND h.news_id=n.id AND p.url = (SELECT p.url FROM photo p WHERE p.news_id = n.id ORDER BY news_id LIMIT 1) GROUP BY n.title
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/insert

INSERT INTO Client (subscription, email, validated,region,fromHTTP) values (#[message.outboundProperties.subType], #[message.outboundProperties.email],0,#[message.outboundProperties.region],#[message.outboundProperties.fromHTTP])
http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/update
update news set processed=1 where topic_id=#[payload.get(0).id]
UPDATE news SET field1=new-value1, field2=new-value2
update client set validated=1 where email = #[message.inboundProperties['email']]
update news set processed=1 where topic_id=#[payload]
update news set processed=1 where topic_id=#[payload['id']]
